extendedInfo.description: *** IMPORT OF STUDENT LIST FROM YOUR COMPUTER IS NOW AVAILABLE VIA http://roster.flapsapps.com ***Are you an educator? Roster app lets you keep track of your students' attendance. Whether you are a college professor, K-12 teacher, graduate assistant, workshop facilitator or even a guitar instructor, forget clumsy piles of paper since your Android-powered phone is already in your pocket.We love receiving feedback! support [at] flapsapps [dot] comCompatibility and RequirementsNot compatible with most tablets including:â¢ ASUS Eee Pad Transformerâ¢ Samsung GALAXY Tabâ¢ Toshiba AT100, Thriveâ¢ Sony Ericsson Xperia PLAYâ¢ HTC FlyerFeaturesâ¢ Import list of students directly from your computer so you don't have to type it on the phoneâ¢ Enter your predefined schedule, or allow Roster to automatically add classes as you goâ¢ Keep track of attendance by marking students as present, late, absent, or absent with an excuse.â¢ Enter multiple classes and have an instant overview of your teaching history.â¢ Take photos on the spot and keep your students' photographs on the roster.â¢ Send attendance data to yourself as a comma-separated-value (CSV) file, so you can open it in any spreadsheet application.Problems?The landscape of Android devices is enormous enough that a three-person team that we are cannot possibly test the app on hundreds of different devices and carriers. Due to this fragmentation, it is notoriously difficult to ensure that camera features, for example, work reliably across devices. While we are constantly expanding the pool of testing devices and while we limit the sale of the app to what we think are capable devices only, your feedback helps us do a better job at this. We love that you take the time to rate and review the app, but if you have questions or specific problems, please let us know via email as we have no way to respond to comments on the Android Market or ask you for details.Keywords:attendance tracking student class roster record school university education course aufnehmen å¤§ ç°¿ instruksjoner instructions frammÃ¸te roster ã® ã¼ Bildung è¿½ ã¸ ç è¨ Dienstplan  è·¡ é² è² posten Kurs ã æ SchÃ¼ler courses åº Kurse skole universitetet Anwesenheitserfassung dnevnik ã¹ Anweisungen ã³ ç¤º utdanning vaktliste å ã å­¦ sporing æ ¡ å¸­ æ ã Ø§ÙØªØ¹ÙÙÙ ÙØ§Ø¦ÙØ© Ø§ÙØ­Ø¶ÙØ± ØªØªØ¨Ø¹ Ø·Ø§ÙØ¨ ÙÙ ÙØ¯Ø±Ø³Ø© Ø¬Ø§ÙØ¹Ø© ØªØ³Ø¬ÙÙ Ø§ÙÙÙØ±Ø±Ø§Øª Ø¨Ø§ÙØ·Ø¨Ø¹ ØªØ¹ÙÙÙØ§Øª

reviews.title: Good but would like to see functionality increased
reviews.comment: It would be great if there was also an option to grab images from the gallery or dropbox rather than having to physically take them with the camera. I would like to use student images that are already on file at our school.
reviews.author: Paul Wilson

reviews.comment: This app rocks. So simple and easy to manipulate attendances, especially export to CSV. Really helps a lot...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close on transformer and xperia play
reviews.comment: This seemed like a great app when i first got it but it force closes all the time. Every time i take a pic for the roster it has an error and closes. Everytime i add a new student it closes then too. This happens on my Sony Xperia Play and my Asus Transformer. I bought the app, now your company needs to fix the app please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Droid razor maxx.  Will not let me import.   The directions are so confessing.  Frustrated because I need this app and it could be so useful.   I need to import app people and I can\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but definite improvements needed
reviews.comment: Pretty good. good enough for quick use as a teacher, but it really should be possible to import class lists. and the force close issue sure is annoying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So much potential
reviews.comment: This app shows a lot of potential and works well so far, but it is in desperate need of an update. Developers should bring it up to ICS UI spec. That would eliminate the reliance on the phone UI - it already works pretty well on a tablet, it would take so little to get rid of the annoying need to turn it to portrait mode every time you change classes.  This app deserves 5 stars for its layout and usefulness; I\'m giving it three for being out of date. Hoping it gets an update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help please!
reviews.comment: I was thrilled, but I\'m currently disappointed. Please help.  I have imported via the online tool. 5 classes for this semester (down from 7 last semester!).  Please contact me to address the following problems. 1. How do I set the time? Everything is defaulting to 9am 2. I am unable to change the schedule after I commit 3. I am unable to edit a class after I create it. I\'ve had to delete several times already.  Thank you for your time.  Also, what do the icons mean? present? tardy? excused? unexcused?
reviews.author: Tommy Adams III

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: This app is missing a lot of features I assumed would be there.  No way to set the date differently -  only month/day (I need day/month/year),  no way to edit student names,  can\'t highlight individual students for their attendance history.  Very,  very basic.  No settings section or even info on how to use it.  Not impressed.  Needs much more development.
reviews.author: andrea simpson

reviews.title: Great idea but problematic
reviews.comment: I have been looking for an app like this for awhile. This one had what I was hoping for. However, every time I try to add a student it force closes.  When I re-open the new student is added, but force close and reopen is not good. Also, force closes when I attempt to add student photos. Also it should be optimized for tablet and start in landscape mode not portrait. Ill keep checking back for updates, cuz I\'m hoping these issues will be worked out soon. Using Toshiba Thrive tablet...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The application is great. Especially at this price. It has solved all of my attendance taking problems. It is stable and has nicely designed ui.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: a waste of money
reviews.comment: No help file. No website help file, FAQs or any support whatsoever.  No use whatsoever.
reviews.author: Jacob Frank

reviews.title: And some more much needed improvements...
reviews.comment: - Supporting \";\" as a separating character in the generated CSV, not just \",\"; - Adding hours to sessions, not just a week day; - Ability to \"cross out\"/delete a particular sessio (for example, on a national holiday);
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eeehhhh
reviews.comment: Safety attendance is cheaper and works better.  Too, bad I didn\'t figure that out before I could still return the app
reviews.author: Jonathan Shaw

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Great idea but not ready for use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Please fix this app. Force closes everytime I do anything!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Diappointed
reviews.comment: Moving from the app \"Attendance\" on my iPhone to this one on my new Toshiba Thrive tablet, I am really not impressed. (1) App force closes constantly, and this is not a new issue. Really, can\'t that be fixed? (2) Can\'t rename students or classes at all? This would seem to be an obvious need that should have been built into the app originally. I know this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: Needs more support. Can\'t change time of class. Pics don\'t upload correctly on my DroidX.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It is great GUI app, really easy to use and helped me a lot... Cool and intuitive options, smooth and stable...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am unable to specify lesson times and the precise time the box is ticked is not recorded. I will be looking for a better app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This App should link directly to your Contacts. You can\'t edit a name you have to delete it. You can\'t easily add a new date.
reviews.author: A Google User
